title: Find the Equation for New Balance
text: For a principal, P, invested at an interest rate, $$r$$, for $$t$$ years, the new balance, A is:\n$$A={Pe}^{r t}$$ when compounded continuously.
speech: For a principal, P, invested at an interest rate,  r , for  t  years, the new balance, A is:\n   a is equal to,   p e raised to the r t power  when compounded continuously.

years, the new balance, A is:    a is equal to,   p e raised to the r t power

title: Subsitute the Values into Equation
speech: a is equal to, 50000 ,    p, is equal to, 10000 ,  t, is equal to, 17 .  50000, is equal to 10000, e raised to the 17 r power . Solve for  r . We get  r is equal to fraction, the natural log of, 5, over 17,   which approximately equals  0.095 .
